info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 18 at 3:39AM CST until January 21 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 10 to 15 expected. * WHERE...Far southeast Arkansas, far northeast Louisiana, and portions of northern and central Mississippi. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to Noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Extremely cold conditions will result in damage to exposed pipes, and water main breaks are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 0 to 10 degrees will also be possible during the overnight hours Friday night and Saturday night.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
